item.title: The hum and the shiver by Alex Bledsoe
item.description: About the book Author: Bledsoe, Alex. Title: The hum and the shiver. Publication: New York : Tor Books, 2011. ISBN 9781455113965. DAISY audio format narrated by Emily Janice Card and Stefan Rudnicki. CELA library call number DC52543. 349 pages in the paperback edition; 9 hrs., 44 mins. as a recorded book. Title: The hum and the shiver. Publication: New York : Tor Books, 2013. ISBN 9781482915600. DAISY audio format narrated by Stefan Rudnicki.
